source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Certification Course in Work & Workforce Management
items.headline: Learn your new managerial responsibilities, get your message across, lead your company to success, and take control
objectives_summary: Learn how to develop great management skills
How to inspire your team to become highly engaged and empowered
Master communication techniques to build a trust-based relationship with your team

items.title: Learn Management To Save Your Company  - MasterClass 2019
items.headline: step by step full management training course where you and I will take a journey  of how to become a successfull manager
objectives_summary: This course will help you become a successful business/organization manager
This course will help you understand how to manage people and get what you want from your subordinates or team
This course will help you gain good management skills so you can progress in your career.

items.title: Learn how to manage conflict in the workplace
items.headline: Start having courageous conversations
objectives_summary: Be able to facilitate courageous conversations in the workplace
Effectively manage people with a variety of working temperaments
Have a framework to deal with conflict in a work environment

items.title: Fit Interview Course for Management Consulting
items.headline: A course developed by former McKinsey consultants on how to crack the Fit Interview
objectives_summary: Ace the Fit part of their consulting interview

items.title: Problem solving at work

visible_instructors.title: Alan Barker
visible_instructors.name: Alan
visible_instructors.job_title: A University of Cambridge tutor and published author

visible_instructors.title: Clare Lynch
visible_instructors.name: Clare
visible_instructors.job_title: Cambridge University writing tutor & professional copywriter

items.headline: Become a more versatile problem-solver. Look at problems in new ways and generate practical solutions.
objectives_summary: Learn a complete method for solving problems at work
Identify your preferred styles of solving problems
Take ownership of problems more confidently

items.title: Hospitality Property Organizational Structure - Updated 2020

visible_instructors.title: Gerry MacPherson
visible_instructors.name: Gerry
visible_instructors.job_title: Hotel, Resort, Inn & Bed and Breakfast Authority

items.headline: Learn How to Set Up An Organizational Structure
objectives_summary: Decide the type of hospitality property owner you are
How to determine your main goals
How to decide the job functions necessary for your hospitality property

items.title: Delegate or Die! Delegation Masterclass
items.headline: Stop doing everything, develop your team and enhance your leadership skills
objectives_summary: Identify the different skills, confidence and experience levels in your team
Have a clear, repeatable process to follow for delegation
Avoid some of the delegation pitfalls!

items.title: Pass Your (PPPO) Foundation Exam From First Attempt

items.headline: Portfolio, Program and project offices PPPO Exam that help you pass the real one in the first attempt with high score.

اجتياز اختبار تأسيس وتشغيل مكتب ادارة المحفظة والبرامج والمشاريع من المرة الأولي
اسئلة تضمن لك اجتياز الاختبار من المرة الأولي وتحاكي الاختبار تماما

items.title: Becoming a Manager Bootcamp

visible_instructors.title: Brent Dalley
visible_instructors.name: Brent
visible_instructors.job_title: Trainer in: Leadership,  Marketing, Family Counseling

items.headline: You know you can become something better. Something more than you are now!  How do you get noticed at work?
objectives_summary: You will learn the art of controlling procrastination
You will learn how to give yourself a confidence boost once in a while
And from that learn how to deal with your fears

items.headline: OKRs
objectives_summary: فهم واستيعاب منهجية الأهداف والنتائج الرئيسية جيدا والقدرة على تطبيقها

items.title: Strategic Management Skills
items.headline: Effectively managing resources to cut cost and improve productivity in the organization
objectives_summary: Learn steps in strategy formulation process
Learn strategy implementation skills
Learn practical SWOT analysis

items.title: Strategic Inventory Management
items.headline: Inventory analysis, Inventory storage, Inventory forecasting, Inventory accounting, Multichannel inventory tracking etc
objectives_summary: Learn about inventory forcasting
Inventory planning and replenishment
Buying and purchasing inventory

items.title: Certified Supplier Quality Manager Training

visible_instructors.title: Sandeep Kumar ­
visible_instructors.name: Sandeep Kumar
visible_instructors.job_title: Experienced Quality Director • Six Sigma Coach • Consultant

items.headline: Certified Supplier Quality Professional (CSQP) Exam Preparation Course - Confidently pass the exam in the first attempt
objectives_summary: Successfully pass the Certified Supplier Quality Professional (CSQP) exam in the first attempt
This course is fully aligned with the Certified Supplier Quality Professional (CSQP) Body of Knowledge provided by most internationally recognized certification bodies.

items.title: Help & support others at work to reduce & manage stress

visible_instructors.job_title: Business coach, mentor & stress management consultant
visible_instructors.title: Liz Makin
visible_instructors.name: Liz

items.headline: How to help & support your staff, team & colleagues to reduce & manage stress at work & in business
objectives_summary: Enable you to support your staff, team & colleagues to reduce and manage stress.
Give you an insight into stress, its impact, symptoms and causes.
Provide you with a stress management process, including practical steps, that your staff, team & colleagues can follow to reduce and manage stress.

items.title: Restaurant Staffing and Hiring
items.headline: Interview like a pro.  Never be understaffed again.
objectives_summary: How to calculate turnover and retention
How to create objective staffing pars
How to interview like a pro
